bibl.title: Greek Polytheophoric Names: An Onomastic Fashion of Roman Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The List: Basis and Exclusions. - Composition, Frequencies, and Distribution. - Relation to Traditional Greek and Egyptian Onomastic Practice. - Some Religious Implications. - Conclusion and Socio-historical Context. - Pp. 86-92: Appendix I. Greek Polytheophoric Names; - 93-94: Appendix II. Egyptian Polytheophoric Names in the Demotisches Namenbuch.
bibl.seg: BENAISSA Amin, Greek Polytheophoric Names: An Onomastic Fashion of Roman Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.

The List: Basis and Exclusions. - Composition, Frequencies, and Distribution. - Relation to Traditional Greek and Egyptian Onomastic Practice. - Some Religious Implications. - Conclusion and Socio-historical Context. - Pp. 86-92: Appendix I.
